text: ยง 11-2209 Reserves. In cases where a taxpayer has applied for a refund and has instituted a proceeding under article seventy-eight of the civil practice law and rules to review a determination adverse to such taxpayer on his or her application for refund, the commissioner of motor vehicles shall set up appropriate reserves to meet any decision adverse to the city.

chapter.text: TAX ON OWNERS OF MOTOR VEHICLES
